arts.sum: This Sunday at 5:15 p.m. (CET), first-place Paris Saint-Germain faces fifth-place Lens at the Parc des Princes in Matchday 4 of Ligue 1 2025-2026. At a press conference, Jonathan Gradit, 32-year-old Lens defender, spoke about this match. A difficult encounter, but one he’s not down on.
